price: Muraheza mucumbika mu mazu mwasigiwe n’abirenganije aho hambere yanyu[12], kandi mwaramenye ukuntu Twabahoneje, Twaranabahaye uburorero butomoye muri Qor’ani, ntimwaheza ngo mwikebuke!”.
arabic: وَسَكَنتُمۡ فِي مَسَٰكِنِ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوٓاْ أَنفُسَهُمۡ وَتَبَيَّنَ لَكُمۡ كَيۡفَ فَعَلۡنَا بِهِمۡ وَضَرَبۡنَا لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَمۡثَالَ
footnotes: [12] Nk’abarungikiwe Intumwa Hudi n’Intumwa Swalehe (za nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah).

meta.transliteration: wasakantum fī masākini alladhīna ẓalamū anfusahum watabayyana lakum kayfa faʿalnā bihim waḍarabnā lakumu al-amthāla
